articles.title: What is a rug pull?
articles.author: Nina Semczuk
articles.summary: In 2024, there were 92 rug pulls worldwide with almost $126 million stolen, according to Comparitech's crypto scam database. Scam is either hard or soft. Hard rug pulls are when a developer has no intention of completing a project and intends to scam investors from the start. Soft rug pulls tend to rely on marketing hype to falsely inflate a project's value and then the founders shut it down and run away with the money. Scammers dump their tokens when they want, leaving investors in the lurch and stuck with worthless assets.

articles.title: El Salvador's Bukele Says Bitcoin Purchases Won't Stop Due to IMF Deal
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: El Salvador's president, Nayib Bukele, has no intention of stopping its accumulation of bitcoin (BTC) no matter what the IMF demands. "This all stops in April, June, or December. No, it's not stopping," he wrote on Tuesday afternoon.

articles.title: Australia's Government Has No Intention Of Creating A Strategic Cryptocurrency Reserve
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: The Australian government does not have any immediate plans to establish a cryptocurrency reserve. This announcement comes at a time when the country is considering setting up a reserve for cryptocurrencies.   Â   .   i.e., Bitcoin, Litecoin, NEMF, Bitcoin Cash.

articles.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: This Key Level Holds the Fate of BTC's Bull Run
articles.author: Crypto Potato
articles.summary: Bitcoin's price has been dropping over the last few weeks. It has made a brief recovery recently, but the correction is not over yet. Edris Derakhshi (TradingRage) shares his technical analysis on the daily chart of Bitcoin's price.

articles.title: Is Asia Crypto's Sleeping Giant? Forget Trump, Asia Crypto Stocks Surging
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: The crypto scene in Asia is rampaging. In the next two years in the UAE, you will be able to do more with cryptocurrency than with the dirham and dollar, according to Mr. Jannet. US reserve narratives in 2025 are obsessed with Donald Trump's pro-crypto policies, while Asia's crypto stocks are climbing independently.

articles.summary: The Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Summit will take place on April 15, 2025. It is the first event dedicated to the rise of Bitcoin reserves and their game-changing role in institutional finance. It will bring together global financial leaders.   Â  .

articles.title: America's Crypto Hostages: President Trump's Moral Imperative to Pardon Innovators
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: The Trump administration has softened regulatory oversight targeting select cryptocurrency firms. Ross Ulbricht was absolved via a court order by the Trump administration of all but one cryptocurrency-related crime.   .  Â    in this case, he was cleared of all charges.

articles.title: Trump sends crypto prices soaring after surprise announcement
articles.author: Alan Suderman
articles.summary: President Trump wants the U.S. government to purchase and hold a variety of digital assets in a strategic reserve fund. Trump is trying to use volatile cryptocurrency prices as a barometer of his public support. Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies prices jumped after Trump's announcement.

articles.title: Sheriff's office warning residents of scam
articles.author: Herald Staff
articles.summary: Dubois County Sheriff's Office received a scam complaint. A resident lost a lot of money in the scam. The subject was told their checking account was hacked and to withdraw all the money from the account and put it into a bitcoin machine. The money would be returned to the account the next day.
